attributes.action: Help me get my mojo back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm 33 in a matter of days and I'm clearly having no luck in the dating stakes. Tony seems to be a very media savvy guy and having a famous face next to me would probably help. I could then have my pick of most eligible ladies on the planet. (Although this would probably backfire if we went to Iraq)

Go on Tone, help me get some!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
